dcterms:creator: A. S. Georghiades
P. N. Belhumeur
D. J. Kriegman
dcterms:description: The Face dataset consists of images (each with 4032 pixels) of ten subjects' faces under various illumination conditions, resulting in a dataset of size 4032 × 631.
dcterms:title: Face dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Fu
W. Ma
T. Chan
J. Bioucas-Dias
M. Iordache
dcterms:description: The hyperspectral (HS) dataset consists of 204 images from the Salinas scene, where each image contains spatial information about the scene at a different spectral band. Each image is 512×217 pixels and after removing pixels without labels, the total dataset is of size 204 × 54129.
dcterms:title: hyperspectral (HS) dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
L. D. Jackel
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset contains 50,000 images of 10 handwritten digits (28 × 28 pixels), which results in a dataset of size 784 × 50k.
dcterms:title: MNIST dataset

dcterms:creator: I. Stevenson
A. Cherian
dcterms:description: The Neuro dataset consists of the firing rates of 187 neurons in motor area (M1) collected at N = 875 time points, when a monkey is performing a center-out reach task moving from a center position to one of 8 targets.
dcterms:title: Neuro dataset

dcterms:description: The union-of-subspaces (UoS) dataset is a synthetic dataset consisting of signals drawn from a union of two subspaces of dimension k = 20 with a 3-dimensional overlap (three coordinates are fully shared by both subspaces). It includes outliers created by generating random Gaussian vectors.
dcterms:title: union-of-subspaces (UoS) dataset
